name: Mexican High School Simulator
summary:
Mexican School Simulator is an anime style school simulator based on the schools of Mexico, the artistic design of the school is based on a real institution, it combines Sandbox, adventure, platformer, mystery, terror and RPG gameplay.

At the beginning of the game you will have your own house, your car and the opportunity to study in this prestigious school.Enter the life of a Mexican student, walk the halls of this school interact with the various students, drive a car, perform various academic activities and have fun.

Explore each classroom of the school, get ready to go back to class also explore a small part of the city of Tepic Nayarit, take a walk around here, and enjoy the graphics that have been optimized for smartphones. And don't forget to investigate the mysteries of this school.
